summary: Netball is a fast-paced team sport for girls and women. Two teams of seven players each try to score points by throwing a ball through a hoop on the opposing team's court. It's mainly played in schools and by women in the Commonwealth countries. Over 20 million people play netball worldwide, with popular leagues in Britain, Australia, and New Zealand. There are big international tournaments, but netball is not yet an Olympic sport.
title: Netball
